Unfortunately, there is no compatible GP: Unfortunately, there is no compatible GPU available to support your training.
Too many users have recently viewed or d: 최근 너무 많은 사용자가 이 파일을 보거나 다운로드했습니다.
Cannot get file from this private link: 이 비공개 링크에서 파일을 가져올 수 없습니다.
An error occurred saving the model: 모델 저장 하는 중에 오류가 발생했습니다.
The model you want to save does not exis: 저장하려는 모델이 존재하지 않으므로 올바른 이름을 입력해야 합니다.
Download the dataset with the audios in: 오디오가 포함된 데이터 세트를 호환 가능한 포맷(.wav/.flac)으로 다운로드하여 모델을 학습하세요.
업로드할 관련 파일을 찾을 수 없습니다.
The model works for inference, and has t: 이 모델은 추론에 사용할 수 있으며, .index 파일을 가지고 있습니다.
The model works for inference, but it do: 이 모델은 추론에 사용할 수 있으나, .index 파일이 없습니다.
This may take a few minutes, please wait: 몇 분 정도 소요될 수 있으니 잠시만 기다려주세요...
Step 5: Export lowest points on a graph: Step 5: 모델 그래프에서 제일 낮은 점을 내보내기
Whether to save only the latest .ckpt fi: 하드 드라이브 공간을 절약하기 위해 최신 .ckpt 파일만 저장할지 여부.
Cache all training sets to GPU memory. C: 모든 학습 세트를 GPU 메모리에 캐시합니다. 10분 미만의 작은 데이터 세트를 캐싱하면 학습 속도를 높일 수 있습니다.
Save a small final model to the 'weights: 각 저장 지점의 '가중치' 폴더에 작은 최종 모델을 저장합니다.
Recommended +12 key for male to female c: 남성에서 여성으로 변환할 때는 +12 키를, 여성에서 남성으로 변환할 때는 -12 키를 사용하는 것이 좋습니다. 음역대가 너무 커서 음성이 왜곡되는 경우 사용자가 직접 적절한 범위로 조정할 수도 있습니다.
Transpose (integer, number Fof semitones: 조옮김(정수, 반음수, 옥타브씩 올리기: 12, 한 옥타브씩 내림: -12):
Enter the path of the audio file to be p: Enter the path of the audio file to be processed (default is the correct format example):
Mangio-Crepe Hop Length (Only applies to: Mangio-Crepe Hop Length (Only applies to mangio-crepe): Hop length refers to the time it takes for the speaker to jump to a dramatic pitch. Lower hop lengths take more time to infer but are more pitch accurate.
If >=3: apply median filtering to the ha: If >=3: apply median filtering to the harvested pitch results. The value represents the filter radius and can reduce breathiness.
Path to the feature index file. Leave bl: Path to the feature index file. Leave blank to use the selected result from the dropdown:
Auto-detect index path and select from t: Auto-detect index path and select from the dropdown:
Resample the output audio in post-proces: Resample the output audio in post-processing to the final sample rate. Set to 0 for no resampling:
Use the volume envelope of the input to: Use the volume envelope of the input to replace or mix with the volume envelope of the output. The closer the ratio is to 1, the more the output envelope is used:
Protect voiceless consonants and breath: Protect voiceless consonants and breath sounds to prevent artifacts such as tearing in electronic music. Set to 0.5 to disable. Decrease the value to increase protection, but it may reduce indexing accuracy:
F0 curve file (optional). One pitch per: F0 curve file (optional). One pitch per line. Replaces the default F0 and pitch modulation:
Export audio (click on the three dots in: Export audio (click on the three dots in the lower right corner to download)
Batch conversion. Enter the folder conta: Batch conversion. Enter the folder containing the audio files to be converted or upload multiple audio files. The converted audio will be output in the specified folder (default: 'opt').
Enter the path of the audio folder to be: Enter the path of the audio folder to be processed (copy it from the address bar of the file manager):
You can also input audio files in batche: You can also input audio files in batches. Choose one of the two options. Priority is given to reading from the folder.
Enter the path of the audio folder to be: Enter the path of the audio folder to be processed:
Specify the output folder for vocals:: Specify the output folder for vocals:
Specify the output folder for accompanim: Specify the output folder for accompaniment:
Whether the model has pitch guidance (re: Whether the model has pitch guidance (required for singing, optional for speech):

Used for male to female and vice-versa c: Used for male to female and vice-versa conversions
Provide the GPU index(es) separated by ': Provide the GPU index(es) separated by '-', like 0-1-2 for using GPUs 0, 1, and 2:

Audio device (please use the same type o: Audio device (please use the same type of driver)
Whether to use note names instead of the: Whether to use note names instead of their hertz value. E.G. [C5, D6] instead of [523.25, 1174.66]Hz
The hubert model path must not contain C: The hubert model path must not contain Chinese characters
The pth file path must not contain Chine: The pth file path must not contain Chinese characters.

Download audio from a YouTube video and: Download audio from a YouTube video and automatically separate the vocal and instrumental tracks
